Chroma Shift

Settings

Instructions

Welcome to Chroma Shift! Instead of swapping adjacent tiles, select a tile and then click/tap another tile in the same row or column to rotate that row or column by one space.

How to Play:

  • Tap/click a tile to select its row or column.
  • Then tap/click another tile in the same row (rotate left/right) or same column (rotate up/down) to trigger a rotation.
  • When a valid rotation creates three or more adjacent tiles of the same color, they clear from the board.
  • Special blocks can be created and activated by larger matches.
  • Complete level objectives within the limited number of moves.
